items.title: 4 Takeaways From No. 5 UConn's 71-63 Win Over Texas
items.description: Here are four takeaways from the Huskies earning their sixth-straight win after beating the Longhorns on Friday.

items.title: Indiana's Curt Cignetti Wins Coach of the Year Award for 2nd Straight Season
items.description: A year after winning the award for the first time, Cignetti delivered an encore after leading the Hoosiers to the greatest season in program history.
